page.title: 09Shrubbery Shire Horses.
page.content: { Messrs.E.and G.Jarrett}keep Shire horses at Shrubbery Farm- William, Diana,Lucky,Liza,Lady Whitesocks, Bessie, Silvercloud,Lassie, Blossom and Rosie are huge,friendly and gentle pets. They win cups at shows in Shrewsbury, Minsterley,Welshpool,Aberystwyth,New- port,Kington and Knighton and have rosettes all over the walls of the house. Everyone in the family helps to dress them for shows.They are shod,washed, brushed,their manes plaited,harnesses polished and fitted and plumes,carna- tions and ferns fixed into the cups and bells. This year{three foals}were born.They will keep our favourite, Rosie's daughter,so we think she'll grow up to be a prize winner too.
